name: Volt
description: Volt is a shiny black oscilloscope-themed robot with classic arms and legs. Its buttons resemble those of a soldier, giving it a strong and resilient appearance. The robot's screen displays a dynamic red and black interface, adding to its striking visual design. It is equipped with a pair of sleek glasses that enhance its analytical abilities. Volt is a proud member of the WebtrES club, using its oscilloscope capabilities to analyze and decode various electronic signals in the digital realm.
